snippet: Dewey & LeBoeuf's ex-finance director pleaded guilty to grand larceny last month and admitted he knew false financial statements were being provided to the firm's lenders, according to court documents unsealed on Thursday....

headline.print_headline: Ex-Dewey Finance Director Admits Accounting Was False
headline.main: Ex-Dewey Finance Director Admits Accounting Was False

lead_paragraph: Dewey & LeBoeuf's ex-finance director pleaded guilty to grand larceny last month and admitted he knew false financial statements were being provided to the firm's lenders, according to court documents unsealed on Thursday.
